entries.content: I have 10K in savings currently in an investment account. My goal is to earn a passive income of $10K every month. Can you please create a tailored plan for me that will meet this goal? Please provide specific, brief instructions for carrying out this plan, focusing on dividend stocks, REITs, peer-to-peer lending, cryptocurrency, creating a blog or online course, and participating in paid surveys and offers.

provide a more personalized and detailed response.Creating a tailored plan to generate a passive income of $10K per month requires careful consideration and diversification across various investment options.
